heading: ICCS |2014 | 7 | 21 | Science | Chemistry | College
subject: Science
question: Question: For water, this value occurs at about 647 Kelvin and 218 atmospheres.  [10] Name this point on a phase diagram at which the liquid and gas phases become indistinguishable.
